channel.title: SQL on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on Automaly
channel.managingEditor: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
channel.webMaster: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)

item.title: SQL cheatsheet
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete SQL reference guide covering data types, commands, constraints, and syntax. Essential cheat sheet for database development and management.

item.title: Database Sync after data type on field has been changed
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshooting guide for resolving database synchronization errors in D365 Finance Operations when field data types have been changed.

item.title: Expressions or Functions used in SSRS
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive reference guide covering all SSRS expressions and functions including globals, operators, text, date/time, math, and aggregate functions for SQL Server Reporting Services.

item.title: Link Type and Join Types in AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to Link Types (Active, Delayed, Passive) and Join Types (InnerJoin, OuterJoin, ExistJoin, NotExistJoin) in Dynamics AX 2012. Learn data source relationships and SQL query patterns.

item.title: Rename a Database in SQL Server
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Step-by-step guide to rename a database in SQL Server including modifying file paths, logical names, and physical files. Complete process with ALTER DATABASE commands and file management.

item.title: Execute Stored Procedure from X++ code
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to execute SQL stored procedures from X++ code in Dynamics AX 2012 using server-side methods with proper SqlStatementExecutePermission and error handling.
